message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make at least $110 to be fair. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $110. Would you be willing to meet me at $100? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
